Rulings.Edison:
● Discarding happens before drawing, which can cause cards like "Jinzo - Returner" to miss their timing.
You can read more about Timing here:
https://edisonformat.net/rules/compendium/missing-the-timing
Rulings.Tengu:
● Discarding happens before drawing, which can cause cards like "Jinzo - Returner" to miss their timing.
You can read more about Timing here:
https://edisonformat.net/rules/compendium/missing-the-timing
Rulings.Goat: ●If there are fewer than 5 cards in the Deck of either player when this card’s Flip Effect is activated, that player will lose the Duel, since the text of this card says draw.

Rulings.Base: 1. If there are fewer than 5 cards in the Deck of either player when this card's Flip Effect is activated, that player will lose the Duel, since the text of this card says "draw".

PSCT.Edison: ① FLIP: Each player discards their hand, then draws 5 cards.
